mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO, SELLER_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_BRAND, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_OPTION, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_REG_DATE, PRODUCT_DEL_DATE, PRODUCT_SELL_START_DATE, PRODUCT_SELL_END_DATE, PRODUCT_AVG_RATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo} ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, SELLER_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_BRAND, PRODUCT_STOCK, PRODUCT_OPTION, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRODUCT_REG_DATE, PRODUCT_DEL_DATE, PRODUCT_SELL_START_DATE, PRODUCT_SELL_END_DATE, PRODUCT_AVG_RATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

select product.PRODUCT_NO, product.SELLER_NO, product.PRODUCT_NAME, product.PRODUCT_PRICE, product.PRODUCT_BRAND, product.PRODUCT_STOCK, product.PRODUCT_OPTION, product.PRODUCT_CONTENT, product.PRODUCT_REG_DATE, product.PRODUCT_DEL_DATE, product.PRODUCT_SELL_START_DATE, product.PRODUCT_SELL_END_DATE, product.PRODUCT_AVG_RATE from product, product_category where product.product_no = product_category.product_no and product_category.category_no = #{categoryNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT VALUES ( PRODUCT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sellerNo}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productBrand}, #{productStock}, #{productOption}, #{productContent}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, '3' )
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_NO=#{productNo}, SELLER_NO = #{sellerNo}, PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName}, PRODUCT_PRICE = #{productPrice}, PRODUCT_BRAND = #{productBrand}, PRODUCT_STOCK = #{productStock}, PRODUCT_OPTION = #{productOption}, PRODUCT_CONTENT = #{productContent}, PRODUCT_REG_DATE = SYSDATE, PRODUCT_DEL_DATE = SYSDATE, PRODUCT_SELL_START_DATE =SYSDATE, PRODUCT_SELL_END_DATE = SYSDATE, PRODUCT_AVG_RATE = '3' WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
